title: STAT+: FDA rejects Regenxbio’s rare-disease gene therapy
description: The Food and Drug Administration has rejected a rare-disease gene therapy from Regenxbio, the company said Monday.
content: The Food and Drug Administration has rejected a rare-disease gene therapy from Regenxbio, the company said Monday.
